Live' started a business investing Rs. 45000. After 3 months, 'Event' joined him with a capital of Rs. 60000. After another 6 months, 'Offer' joined them with a capital of Rs. 90000. At the end of the year, they made a profit of Rs. 20000. What would be 'Offer's share in it?
optionB: Rs 4000 Answer: Option D Explanation: Just take care of the months of investment, rest all will be simple. Yogesh:Pranab:Atul = 45000*12:60000*9:90000*3 = 2:2:1 Atul's share = Rs. 20000 * (1/5) = Rs. 4000
correctAns: Rs 4000 Answer: Option D Explanation: Just take care of the months of investment, rest all will be simple. Yogesh:Pranab:Atul = 45000*12:60000*9:90000*3 = 2:2:1 Atul's share = Rs. 20000 * (1/5) = Rs. 4000
